summary: Completed comprehensive testing of redesigned admin analytics page. All core functionality working correctly with 95% success rate. Analytics dashboard loads properly with KPI cards, interactive period tabs, charts, and responsive design.

minor_issues.issue: Chart rendering console warnings about width/height being -1
minor_issues.impact: Charts display correctly but show console warnings
minor_issues.details: Recharts library warnings about container dimensions, does not affect functionality

design_issues.details: Charts render correctly but show console warnings about width/height calculations

passed_tests: Analytics page loads without errors
Admin login with gsnadmin/gsnadmin credentials works
Analytics Dashboard header displays correctly
Revenue KPI card shows Rs 300 with proper styling
Orders KPI card shows 3 orders with proper styling
Profit KPI card shows Rs 0 with proper styling
Visitors KPI card shows 23 visitors with proper styling
Period selector tabs (Today, Week, Month, All Time) all present and clickable
Tab switching functionality works correctly
Revenue Trend chart displays with proper data visualization
Chart period selector (7/30/90 days) works correctly
Order Status pie chart renders with donut design
Order status legend shows 'Pending: 2' correctly
Top Selling Products section displays 'No sales data yet' message
Responsive design works on desktop, tablet, and mobile viewports
All backend analytics APIs return 200 status
Analytics Overview API provides data for all periods
Top Products API returns empty array (expected for new system)
Revenue Chart API returns 31 data points
Order Status API returns status breakdown
Profit Analytics API returns profit data for all periods

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all features working with minor console warnings)

analytics_page_load.details: Analytics Dashboard loads successfully without errors

kpi_cards_display.details: All 4 KPI cards (Revenue, Orders, Profit, Visitors) display with correct values and styling

period_selector_tabs.details: All period tabs (Today, Week, Month, All Time) are present and functional

revenue_trend_chart.details: Revenue trend area chart displays correctly with interactive period selector

order_status_pie_chart.details: Order status donut chart renders with proper legend and data

top_products_table.details: Top selling products section displays appropriate 'No sales data yet' message

responsive_design.details: Analytics page adapts correctly to desktop, tablet, and mobile viewports

backend_api_integration.details: All 5 analytics API endpoints return proper data and integrate correctly with frontend

analytics_implementation_review.layout_organization: Excellent - Clean grid layout with 4 KPI cards, charts row, and products table
analytics_implementation_review.visual_design: Professional - Dark theme with amber accents, proper spacing, and visual hierarchy
analytics_implementation_review.interactivity: Fully functional - Period tabs, chart selectors, and responsive interactions work correctly
analytics_implementation_review.data_visualization: Effective - Area chart for revenue trends, donut chart for order status, clear KPI metrics
analytics_implementation_review.user_experience: Smooth - Fast loading, intuitive navigation, appropriate empty states

chart_rendering_analysis.revenue_chart: Area chart with gradient fill displays revenue trend over time with proper axes and tooltips
chart_rendering_analysis.order_status_chart: Donut chart with color-coded segments and legend shows order distribution
chart_rendering_analysis.chart_responsiveness: Charts adapt to different screen sizes but show console warnings about dimensions
chart_rendering_analysis.chart_interactivity: Period selector for revenue chart works correctly, tooltips display on hover

api_endpoints_tested./api/analytics/overview: Returns revenue, orders, and visits data for all time periods
api_endpoints_tested./api/analytics/top-products: Returns empty array (expected for new system)
api_endpoints_tested./api/analytics/revenue-chart: Returns 31 data points for chart visualization
api_endpoints_tested./api/analytics/order-status: Returns order status breakdown with counts
api_endpoints_tested./api/analytics/profit: Returns profit calculations for all time periods
